Name: Green Field Silver Tree / 绿野白银树
About the game: You are an ordinary high school student, but you have gained spiritual power in one incident. The person who gives you the power to tell you that you must exercise yourself to defeat God. Different Worlds You will experience the ordinary world and the world full of spirituality, and even the world after death. New Beginning After you have a little strength, you start a new adventure. You will resolve the conflict between the two schools. You will recognize the true face of a gaming company. You will also commit suicide to save your friends. Simple Battle You only have two common combos, a normal spiritual attack, and a plain skill. However, your enemies will use a wealth of skills, you must make good use of dodge and defense
